snippet.title: MASTERS OF LIGHT | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy MASTERS OF LIGHT now on Meta Quest Store : https://www.meta.com/experiences/6784615031600264/

Shadows are threatening the galaxy and it’s up to you to join the fight! 🌠
Feel the pulse of MASTERS OF LIGHT, an electrifying action adventure game where you harness unstoppable magic superpowers with HAND TRACKING 👐
Conquer 36 levels with unlimited replay, upgrade 5 skills and become a superhero, the ultimate Master of Light. Feel like a badass in VR! ✨
Fight, workout and dance to our intense synthwave soundtrack while exploring breathtaking VR environments. 🌌
The galaxy needs you! Will you be strong enough to face what awaits you at the heart of the Black Hole? 

Key features :
- 2 ways to play : hand-tracking or controllers
- 3 difficulty modes : easy / normal / hard 
- 5 superpowers to master and upgrade including freezing time! ⏳
- 7 types of enemies 
- 20 trophies to unlock 🏆
- 36 levels ⚡️

Join our Discord : https://discord.com/invite/S6pUVvJNWZ

Want to know more about MASTERS OF LIGHT and COVEN?
https://linktr.ee/WeCoven

COVEN is a video game studio focusing on strong emotional stories, innovative gameplays and inclusivity.

#MastersOfLight #Coven #vr  #vrgaming #metaquest2 #metaquest3 #oculus #GameOn #GamerLife #gamingcommunity #youtubegaming
